description.raw:
This supercedes [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2673](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2673)

Since we extended the noise description in SDF to support dynamic bias stddev and correlation time to support ign-sensors and ign-gazebo, I reused those values and implementation here.  Both the ign-sensors variant and here use @{557058:169ff364-18d4-4ba3-bf5a-4fd0ab88c331} 's original design of passing `dt` into the `Apply` method for noise.

‌

* SDFormat: [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/525](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/525)
* Ignition Sensors: [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/58](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/58)

‌
description.html:
This supercedes #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2673

Since we extended the noise description in SDF to support dynamic bias stddev and correlation time to support ign-sensors and ign-gazebo, I reused those values and implementation here. Both the ign-sensors variant and here use @James Goppert 's original design of passing dt into the Apply method for noise.

‌

  • SDFormat: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/525
  • Ignition Sensors: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/58
